Mentor Matching - Team 19

Matthew Bell, Christopher Lau and Harry Chen are working on creating a system to match mentors and mentees in their workplace based on their preferences, on behalf of Atos UK. This website covers the research we have done to create a fully working Proof of Concept.

View Project

Latest Posts

Background Research

04 Nov 2016

Before the team began diving into heavy technical researching, we decided to conduct some background research based on the problem definition we were given. During this phase, we focused on indentifying what the Stable Marriage Problem was to get an overview of the problem. We also looked at some of the similar applications online.

Project Background and Initial Considerations

18 Oct 2016

Our Client

Atos is a leader in digital services. Serving a global client base, Atos provides Consulting & Systems Integration services, Managed Services & BPO, Cloud operations, Big Data & Cyber-security solutions, as well as transactional services through Worldline, the European leader in the payments and transactional services industry.
